meanings.sent1: I always prewrap my gifts to save time later.
meanings.sent2: She prewraps the presents before the party.
meanings.sent3: The clever squirrel prewrapped all the nuts for winter.
meanings.sent4: The idea prewrapped itself in my mind, ready to be presented.
meanings.sent5: The chef prewrapped the sandwiches to keep them fresh.

meanings.definition: The act of wrapping something before it is needed.
meanings.sent1: The prewrapping of the gifts made the event smoother.
meanings.sent2: I like to do the prewrapping ahead of time.
meanings.sent3: The prewrapping of the snacks was a hit at the picnic.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a prewrapping of joy before the surprise.
meanings.sent5: The prewrapping of the books made them look more appealing.
